title: Adem Kapič
text:
Adem Kapič (born 16 April 1975) is a retired <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>.
During his club career, Kapič notably played for <a href="MSV%20Duisburg">MSV Duisburg</a>, <a href="Alemannia%20Aachen">Alemannia Aachen</a>, <a href="Ferencv%C3%A1rosi%20TC">Ferencvárosi TC</a> and <a href="Beitar%20Jerusalem">Beitar Jerusalem</a>. He also made six appearances for the Slovenia national team.
